html:
1.28.21  6:05 am   In "here comes the sun", why are there smileys when you are singing about sadness?

      that's just a bit of reverse psychology

1.28.21  5:44 am   how are u able to think of lyrics and stuff of your videos

      one of my secret tools for this, is music

1.28.21  5:36 am   what is your opinion on brexit?

      seems like brenter was just yesterday

1.28.21  4:57 am   can you make me a song?

      sure

1.28.21  3:51 am   what is the fourth word sung in your next song?

      and

1.28.21  3:03 am   Why are you so calming?

      that's because i've done all the panicking for you

1.28.21  2:56 am   What is your favorite song that you've ever created?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.28.21  2:35 am   Any tips on making videos? I feel like a perfectionist and feel like whatever idea I have isn't good enough. Any tips on helping me through that?

      try making it really bad

1.28.21  2:12 am   is the earth flat?

      it was supposed to be, but something went insanely wrong

1.28.21  12:51 am   did you start work on here comes the sun immediately after might quit or did you actually quit for a lil while

      extremely neither

1.28.21  12:32 am   1.27.21  8:07 pm but singing is overwhelming 

      try drawing, or walking

1.27.21  11:44 pm   what genre of music do you make?

      normal

1.27.21  11:07 pm   What is that crazy synth sound between "I'm just falling in love" and "stop, time's up?"

      flutes

1.27.21  9:44 pm   Your songs have an unexplainable power. 

      holy smokes you are very friendly

1.27.21  9:32 pm   how long approximately is your next song?

      3 minutes and 22 seconds

1.27.21  9:14 pm   was the sudden ending of the moon is made of cheese on "the moon is pretty cheap." intended originally or did you just think of it while you were writing it

      writing is what i originally did

1.27.21  9:03 pm   what the heck is sports? it looks like war, but it's just plastic and not bombs and death and stuff

      it's the peace version of war

1.27.21  8:53 pm   do you exist?

      it's on my to do list

1.27.21  8:48 pm   what is your favorite song of you

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.27.21  8:19 pm   What bad thing did you do

      tried to crash the stock market but accidentally made it go really high instead

1.27.21  8:13 pm   what is your goal

      maybe do some goalpost reviews

1.27.21  8:07 pm   the world we live in is so overwhelming. how do i stop being overwhelmed by everything

      sing about it

1.27.21  7:58 pm   What was going through your head while writing here comes the sun?

      sunny thoughts

1.27.21  7:21 pm   can you give me some words of wisdom?

      all words have wisdom in them somewhere

1.27.21  6:49 pm   how did like half of your songs predict so much of 2020 (mostly just did a bad thing)

      that's because 2020 was a very normal, average year

1.27.21  5:50 pm   do your songs have deeper meaning?

      than what

1.27.21  4:40 pm   what genre of music do you even write

      regular

1.27.21  4:11 pm   will you ever release an album?

      i prefer to release songs individually

1.27.21  3:39 pm   what song does sadness sing

      something happy, i'll bet

1.27.21  3:15 pm   mount st. helens last blew up in 1980, when does "mount st. helens is about to blow up" take place?

      mid september, 2018

1.27.21  3:15 pm   are your songs written taking into account their respective videos?

      no. the video is made after. But, sometimes, as a songwriting technique, i try to imagine a video. But that has nothing to do with what i will eventually make as the video. that's just to help the songwriting

1.27.21  2:59 pm   Are you a person

      oh that would explain a lot

1.27.21  1:50 pm   what do you use to make music

      we'll see

1.27.21  1:20 pm   Is there any reason to why you address your viewers so dearly in some of your songs?

      everyone is dear. that's why you're supposed to say "Dear _____" when you write a letter to someone. it doesn't matter who it is. they are dear

1.27.21  1:05 pm   Is life a simulation?

      of what

1.27.21  1:00 pm   Have you ever had such a bad day that you turned it into a song?

      sure

1.27.21  12:41 pm   is is okay to play chords with your left hand?

      sure, as long as you know what everyone else is doing / not doing

1.27.21  12:23 pm   what's the time signature of the terminator theme? i keep  hearing 7/8 but i'm not sure.

      that's 13. if i were charting it i'd say 13/16. (at least for the intro, i didn't listen to the rest yet)

1.27.21  12:20 pm   i love your work a lot, and im curious, is there any go to programs you use to create your videos or signature effects you use to build the atmosphere of the videos?

     the problem with going to programs is, they disappear. and you have to go to a new one and rebuild your entire life

      like how at the airplane terminal had the little effects in the around the world part, is there anything specific you did for that? sorry if this is weird hehe

     this was accomplished by screwing with the frame rate. cut the frame rate in half, then blur the in betweens. if i remember correctly, i think that's what's going on in there

1.27.21  11:53 am   what was your inspiration behind soap tips

     soap

      and what is your current opinion on soap

     it's pretty good

1.27.21  10:19 am   many people have asked what's Steve's real name and you said his real name is your name ( refering to those who asked ) but what if a person's name is Steve and he askes what's Not-Steve's real name, it can't be Steve's name because Not-Steve's name isn't Steve, how is this possible?

      that's the magic of satire

1.27.21  10:18 am   did you ever figure out if you're sad, glad, or if youre just having a bad glad dream?

      yes, i'm doing all that stuff

1.27.21  9:54 am   What is the 7th note of your upcoming song?

      c#

1.27.21  9:50 am   how do i get to the weird dimension your videos take place in

      pretty much just go through any door

1.27.21  8:33 am   tips on how to be more self-confident

      explore the space you are in

1.27.21  7:57 am   do you have any tips for blender to do things like right at the beginning of here comes the sun (more specifically the sadness part) or is there a video that helped you?

      i think the first thing that's gonna empower you is to build a camera rig you're comfortable with. i never saw anyone else do this, i made my own. it's 2 objects and i still don't like it, but it's way better than nothing, and i've built a lot of tricks for it

1.27.21  7:52 am   how do you believe your skill at making music is compared to other artists

      medium

1.27.21  7:37 am   How long have you worked on "here comes the sun" video,

     maybe a total of 10 or 15 weeks

     did you literally spent a year on it?

     no

1.27.21  7:16 am   how many words aren't in the title of your next song?

      most of them

1.27.21  7:05 am   Where do you get ideas from/where do they come from?

      the gutter, if not i'll check the sewer
